name: Tabletop Reverse Pike
target: Full Body, Upper Body, Core, Lower Body
target_muscles: Shoulders, Triceps, Biceps, Abs, Glutes, Hamstrings, Quadriceps
instruction: Sit on the mat with your knees bent, your arms extended back, your fingers facing the body, and your feet hip-width apart. Lift your butt off the mat, coming into a tabletop position. Lower your hips, straighten the legs and lengthen the spine. Raise your hips, lift your torso and return to the tabletop position. Repeat.
hints: Breathe out as you lower your hips and straighten your legs, keeping your arms straight, your spine long and your hips off the floor. Inhale as you lift your hips and return to the tabletop position.
